DOC.brief_title: Krill Oil Study Compared Fish Oil
DOC.detailed_description: The main purpose study evaluate absorption omega-3 fatty acid blood follow consumption krill oil compare fish oil placebo . An additional purpose evaluate lipid-lowering efficacy safety consumption Krill Oil Fish Oil placebo product . It show ingestion Krill Oil lead good absorption omega-3 fatty acid compare ingestion Fish Oil . It also show consumption krill oil fish oil result favorable modification lipid profile . Therefore , anticipated consumption krill oil fish oil improve lipid profile , well health-related marker safe well tolerate .
DOC.criteria: healthy men premenopausal pregnant nursing woman 18 49 year old . smoker rheumatoid arthritis chronic illness cardiovascular problem dyslipidemia liver kidney disease diabetes endocrine metabolic disease inflammatory bowel disease pancreatitis gallbladder biliary disease neurological/psychological disease bleed disorder experience platelet abnormality gastrointestinal disorder could interfere fat absorption hypertension history cancer intention lose weight use anticoagulant serum triglyceride ( TG ) > 200 mg/dL , and/or total cholesterol ( TC ) > 240 mg/dL , and/or LDLcholesterol ( LDLC ) > 160 mg/dL hypertension lipid lower medication consumption one alcoholic drinks/day Consumption one fish seafood serve one month prior start study omega6 fatty acid past 6 month plan consume seafood product fish use omega3 omega6 fatty acid nutritional supplement anytime duration study plan become pregnant study period BMI > 28 allergy fish seafood corn
